title: Power Tools Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of common power tools and their uses around the home and workshop.

questions.question: Which power tool uses a rotating circular blade to make straight cuts through wood?

questions.question: Which power tool uses an abrasive disc or belt to smooth surfaces?

What is a reciprocating saw commonly nicknamed?

options: Driving long screws and lag bolts

questions.question: Which power tool blows hot air and is used for stripping paint or shrinking tubing?
